PersonalStatement.text: Patricia Phelps, born on 1975-05-09, is a Female based in Francismouth, American Samoa. She is Single and holds Singaporean nationality. Currently working at Mann, Campos and Middleton.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Conner, Hall and Ward from 2013 to 2018.
Senior Research Scientist at Mann, Campos and Middleton, 2023 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Chitkara University
Master's in Engineering from University of Deusto

PersonalSkills.text: Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys gardening.
